meanings.definition: A type of bread that is fried in oil or fat.
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes delicious frybread for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The frybread at the fair smelled amazing.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my frybread on the floor, but my dog was happy.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the frybread in the pan was like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The golden color of the frybread made it look irresistible.

meanings.definition: To cook bread by frying it in oil or fat.
meanings.sent1: We decided to frybread for dinner instead of baking it.
meanings.sent2: The chef showed us how to properly frybread in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: I always burn the frybread when I get distracted by the TV.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of frybread frying filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around to watch the frybread sizzle in the pan.
